## Theme.setComponentStyle() method

Configure a specific Blockly UI component with a style value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setComponentStyle(componentName: string, styleValue: AnyDuringMigration): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  componentName | string | The name of the component. |
|  styleValue | AnyDuringMigration | The style value. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
